name: Lord Champfort

skills.name: Annihilating Hit
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 45% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: Single target. 45% chance to place Decrease DEF.

skills.notes: HP-based damage. Good for boss and wave defense reduction.

skills.name: Earthshaker
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Places a 50% [Decrease ACC] debuff and a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: AoE. Places Decrease ACC and Decrease ATK.

skills.notes: Excellent for reducing incoming damage and debuff accuracy.

skills.name: Thornsphere
skills.description: At the start of each turn, places a [Shield] buff on this Champion equal to 20% of their MAX HP for 2 turns. Will place a 15% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 1 turn on whichever enemy attacks this Champion.
skills.notes: Shield and Decrease SPD make him strong for Scarab King and soloing content.

forms.aura: Increases Ally HP in Dungeons by 50%
forms.comments: Lord Champfort excels as a tank and debuffer, especially in dungeons and Doom Tower. His passive shield and Decrease SPD are key for Scarab King and solo strategies.

masteries.general: Warmaster for all PVE content (A1 'Annihilating Hit' single-target HP-scaling, 60% proc per skill). Correct T6 for single-hit champion. Master Hexer CRITICAL (extends Dec DEF/Dec ACC/Dec ATK/HP Burn debuffs for team support). Eagle Eye CRITICAL (+50 ACC for 250+ total, reliable debuff landing). Cycle of Magic CRITICAL (reduces A2/A3 cooldowns for more frequent AoE debuffs/Shield). Lasting Gifts CRITICAL (Doom Tower - extends Shield buffs from A3). Unshakeable CRITICAL (Arena - +50 RES for 90 total, immunity to CC for tank/support role). Deterrence (HP-based champion, extra damage mitigation). Flawless Execution option for dungeons/Arena if not using Warmaster.
